title: Portfolio Site
description: A static site made with React + GatsbyJS and deployed on Netlify.

title: Film Findr
description: A React web app that allows users to search for movies.

title: Fun Food Friends
description: Fun Food Friends with Firebase RTDB is a React web app that allows users to log what they bring to a potluck.

title: Book List
description: Book List with vanilla JavaScript is a web app that allows users to keep track of books they're interested in.
